and an EV/subsidy regime tied to policy/tariff dynamics such as the end of the $7,500 EV credit and tariffs) and state transitional conditions; (2) make the causal chain explicit end-to-end: cloud capex and platform moat drive backlogs and margins for hyperscalers (cite 0G3A676BP, TN66GHPAT), which in turn sustain long-horizon cash generation and justify elevated valuations; link this to productivity/upskilling benefits from labor-centric governance (cite 4LQD15CFU and JUST Capital data); (3) quantify with precision and source-trace every claim: MSFT Q4FY2025 revenue 76.4B, Azure 39% growth, backlog 368B (0G3A676BP); Shopify 31% revenue growth and FCF $422M (0G3A676BP); Rivian/Tesla specifics (Rivian EBITDA breakeven by 2027, R2 launch, VW and DOE backing) from P0K0UEOHU; cloud-portfolio exposures (Salesforce, Adobe, Snowflake, Zoom, ServiceNow, The Trade Desk, DigitalOcean) from TN66GHPAT;
